extendedInfo.description: Can you save the Honey from the flying Honey Bees?? If yes then have this FREE game, that will indeed be an enjoyable treat for you!The sweet cunning bees are flapping their wings and flying all around the screen. Thereâs a smell of honey in the air. Drops of honey is falling one by one and you have to just tilt your Android smartphone and use the acceleration technique to glide the falling honey from left to right & vice versa to help it land safely on ground without being snatched by flying bees. To build up speed you have to tilt your phone in x-y direction.The backgrounds for different difficulty levels is full of beautiful things all around like hills, lovely flowers, blue-green water,small but very sweet hut, cute birds, greenary and many more and so is the application. Then let the tiny bees soar. Make sure to have a soft landing and collect as much honey or pollen as possible.How To Play: Game includes 3 levels : Easy, Medium and Hard. Each level has unlimited number of stages. On each level, you must protect the honey. You have to complete tasks in every level. The level has been won when the honey drops are saved from the bees.As the level moves from easy -->Medium ---> Hard, density and speed of the honey bees increases which increases the complexity and of course interest in game. Multiple features that will catch your imagination: 1. User friendly as controls are very simple, you only have to tilt your Android mobile to save the beautiful honey drops.2. High contrast color scheme so that small screen devices with low resolutions can easily see what's on the screen.4. Simple and easy to play but involves a good mind and hand control exercise.5. Honey Drops are falling, with a beautiful live nature picture is really eye pleasing !   7. Development involves accelerometer in libgdx and library of openGL, so it is really fast and uses very little memoryIf you are a nature lover, or simply a lover of well-executed games like Tiny Bee Lite, Honey Marble Saga ,Talking honey cat, Honey Battle - Bears vs Bees etc, then the Honey bee war is worth checking out.There are several achievements to reach like share your scores via Facebook and Twitter to your friends.The application has been tested extensively on various models of Samsung galaxy ace,Samsung Galaxy Tab, Sony Xperia, HTC One V. It is designed for these resolutions: 240*320, 320*480, 480*854, 480*800,800*1280,600*1024.The controls are very simple and user friendly! game gives a thrilling ride while being very addictive!Tags: Free games, Fun games, Free entertainment, Casual games,honey drop game, magical honey bee game.
